title: Neutra-ish
content: I'm a student working on a typeface project. I am looking for a freeware font similar to Neutraface Slab Display Titling. I would buy it but there is no way I can afford it. Obviously I'm not going to find an exact match, but something with the same personality would be great.
author: jo_z

comments.content: Rockwell comes with any Windows computer. Or was it MS Office? Anyway: Check out [Silica](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131004303/http:/www.stonetypefoundry.com/silicaoverview.html) by Sumner Stone. The price tag is very student friendly, and it works for display use.
You're just in time for [Museo Slab](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131004303/http:/www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/museoslab.html) – should be worth a look. The «500» weight is free.

\> Check out Silica by Sumner Stone.

I look at the regular weight of that typeface... and instead of Memphis, I'm reminded of... **Jenson Oldstyle**!!!
